FuncDef: The display device command displays the type and status of components on a device. The display device command displays the type and status of components on a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the type and status of components on the device. If slot-id is specified, interface information on the device is displayed.
-

ExtraInfo: You can use this command to check the working status of components on a device and check whether the device is working normally.
